casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alexander C. POLKE. No. 412A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 9, 2006. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, William Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of March 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Alexander Charles Polke) shall have up to and including the 7th day of April 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of March 2006."
